span.b: Hiawatha Academies buildings are closed through at least May 4. Distance Learning in effect.

h3.br:
Time: Mondays, 10 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Location: Hiawatha Collegiate High School

div.h1: All Hiawatha Academies scholars will be empowered with the knowledge, character, and leadership skills to graduate from college and serve the common good.

div.style: background-image:url();background-color: rgb(255,255,255,);;background-repeat:;background-position:; background-size:; background-attachment:scroll; display:block; width:100%; float:none;

div.p:
Apply today!
Are you looking for a school committed to ensuring your child thrives, learns and leads? Our college-preparatory educational program is based on true inquiry, intellect, and character.
Apply Now!

div.style: background-image:url();background-color: rgb(255,255,255,);;background-repeat:;background-position:; background-size:; background-attachment:scroll; display:block; width:100%; float:none;

p.span: Hiawatha Academies Inaugural Senior Signing Day was a fabulous success! We celebrated our amazing founding senior class, who were ALL admitted to college! Way to go Wolves!!

div.style: background-image:url();background-color: rgb(255,255,255,);;background-repeat:;background-position:; background-size:; background-attachment:scroll; display:block; width:100%; float:none;

div.p:
Join our team!
We seek driven, passionate, social-justice-minded educators to join our team in instructional and non-instructional roles.
Learn more about a career at Hiawatha Academies and apply today.

div.style: background-image:url();background-color: rgb(255,255,255,);;background-repeat:;background-position:; background-size:; background-attachment:scroll; display:block; width:100%; float:none;

div.p:
Complete e-Update
During back to school season, once admitted, Hiawatha families can now complete required forms online! It is super easy to set up and infinite campus account and complete e-Update. To learn how to learn how to access your parent portal, click here.

div.div: How to log in to Google ClassroomSupport your student to login daily into google classroom. Instructions for logging in can be found here.Apoye a su estudiante a ingresar a Google Classroom diariamente. Las instrucciones para iniciar sesión [...]
